text:
ScriptAlias takes two arguments, a fakename and a realname.

when I checked it on Event Viewer as it asked me to do, I found out this message. Please help me.

Bugzilla is for bugs, not for support.  Try the users mailing list if you're having trouble interpreting that error message.
